faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions. You will need a Spanish tax identification number (NIE) and should consult with a Spanish property lawyer to navigate regulations. Most international buyers find the process straightforward with proper professional guidance.

faqs.question: What are the costs of buying property in Spain?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, budget for transfer tax (6-10% depending on region), notary fees (1%), property registration (0.1%), and legal fees (1%). Property taxes are approximately 0.4-1.1% annually. We can provide detailed cost breakdowns during consultation.
